scenes.description: MC section where Pavolia Reine is joined by Takanashi Kiara. They talk about their history as the duo 'Pavonashi' and perform their 'bird mating dance'.
Performance of the song 'Idol' (by YOASOBI) by Pavolia Reine and Kobo Kanaeru.

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: A media stir with an invincible smile

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: I want to know your secret, so mysterious

subtitles.original: 抜けてるとこさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her flaws are within her area

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: You, perfect and a liar,

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: are a genius idol

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today? What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: If you go out, where do you go?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない、それは内緒
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything, that's a secret

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: No matter what I'm asked, I dodge it smoothly

subtitles.original: そう淡々とだけど燦々と
subtitles.english: So indifferently, yet brilliantly

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない蜜の味
subtitles.english: A taste of honey that's almost visible but not

subtitles.original: ないないない、それもないないない
subtitles.english: No, no, no, none of that either

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？相手は？さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Who's your partner? Come on, answer

subtitles.original: 誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ
subtitles.english: I don't really understand things like falling in love with someone

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ないそんな言葉にまた一人堕ちる
subtitles.english: With words that might be lies or truth, someone falls for them again

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Making them love you again

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: Everyone is captivated by you, you're the perfect, ultimate idol

subtitles.original: 金輪際現れない一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: A miracle that will never appear again, the reincarnation of the brightest star

subtitles.original: その笑顔で愛してるで誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: With that smile and "I love you", you captivate everyone

subtitles.original: その瞳がその言葉が嘘でもそれは完全なアイ
subtitles.english: Even if those eyes and those words are lies, it's a perfect love

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です我々は端からおまけです
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special. We've been just extras from the start

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Ｂです
subtitles.english: We're just the background character B to make the star shine

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のお陰なわけない
subtitles.english: There's no way everything is thanks to her

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い妬み嫉妬なんてないわけない
subtitles.english: Cheeky envy and jealousy? There's no way we don't have them

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃないからこそ許せない
subtitles.english: This isn't a joke, that's why it's unforgivable

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない自分を許せない
subtitles.english: I won't forgive you if you're not perfect. I won't forgive myself

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I won't recognize anyone but you, who are stronger than anyone

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じ崇めてるまさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: Everyone believes and worships you, truly the strongest, invincible idol

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない一番星を宿してる
subtitles.english: No weaknesses to be found, harboring the brightest star

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: You mustn't show any weak points

subtitles.original: 知りたいくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Without showing the parts people don't want to see

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤそれこそ本物の愛
subtitles.english: You must be one of a kind. That's what true love is
